page.title: 13MY HOUSE; ABBEY WOOD (1)
page.content: In my house you can't get any peace and quiet. There's always babies crying, dogs snoring or my dad moaning. I get fed up and go upstairs. It's just as bad though because my brothers follow and when I tell them to go away they sit on the stairs and SCREAM! So in the end they're upstairs with ME. My bedroom is quite small, the smallest in fact but it's quite nice. I like laying on my bed listening to my UB40 L.P. My room is square and a bit compact. My wardrobe is long and takes up a whole wall. I have quite large windows. My mum and dad's room is next to mine (just as you come up the stairs it's in front of you.) It's much larger and long, my bedroom is half the size. The window in their bedroom is the same size. I go in there to watch the portable television. MORE...P.14
